mapper.select: select D.ID AS "id", D.VERSION AS "version", D.ACTIONNAME AS "actionName", D.ACTION AS "action", D.REMARK AS "remark", D.CREATETIME AS "createTime", D.MENUID AS "menu.id", M.NAME AS "menu.name" from D left join M on D.MENUID = M.ID where D.ID in #{item}
